entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
